Lightning Talk: You Should Use AddressSanitizer - Brody Holden - CppCon 2023
https://github.com/CppCon/CppCon2023

This talk aims to get you, yes you, to use Address Sanitizer. ASan will detect various memory errors and is worth your time. 
---

Brody Holden

Brody works in fintech and lives in Canada. When he's not using ASAN he is thinking about using ASAN.
